idea:
CYBERAMAZE SOLUTIONS

CyberAmaze Solutions (CAS) is a venture offering services globally in Cyber Security, with operations from Mumbai. Our team comprises highly qualified professionals with diverse experience in various businesses. Our services enable Clients with protection against potential data breach and information security threats. Our experts possess requisite industry standard certifications such as CEH, CISSP, AWS Certified architect, MS Azure Security Engineer Associate, ISO 27001 Auditor & Implementer, CPISI Certified Payment Card Industry Security Implementer, etc.

We cover full spectrum of –

• Penetration Testing

• Vulnerability Assessments

• Internal Security Audit

• Source Code Review

• Digital Forensic Analysis

• Risk Assessment

• Architecture and Infrastructure Review

• PCI DSS compliance consultation and pre audit preparation

• GDPR compliance review and preparation

• ISO 27001 setup and pre audit preparation
name: CYBERAMAZE SOLUTIONS LLP

idea:
HeyHere.co is a simple way for Indian small business owners (from the services category) to get their business online.


In minutes, they get their own beautiful online store. In this store, they can engage customers, showcase their offerings, showcase their online content, brand their store, and accept payments (international and domestic).

Who are these small and solo services businesses?

Beauticians, Salons, Local Restaurants, Gyms, Spas, Photographers, Interior Decorators, Nutritionist, Physiotherapists, Financial/ Legal/ Lifestyle advisors, Counselors, Yoga instructors, Fitness trainers, Teachers, Artists, Fashion Designers, Painters, Real estate brokers, Cooks, Matrimony Matchmakers, Astrologers, Mehandi artists, Event managers, Tattoo artists, Birthday party entertainers, Travel agencies and more such small businesses engaged in services.


As HeyHere is targetting India’s small and solo businesses, it supports local Indian language store creation as well.
name: HUMAN TALES TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: A company that deploys outdoor collaborative workspaces in IT Parks and Commercial campuses.
name: Phi Space

idea:
To engage into business activities that enhance and enrich the post-retirement lives of Veterans especially Indian Armed Forces Veterans, from up-skilling and employment to overall well-being. To use the online media and portal focused on assisting and engaging veterans with activities such as, skill translation, skill upgradation and operate as a job board for purposes to interact with corporates to find internships and final job placements in India and abroad.

2. To carry on the business of human resource management and to provide services in all forms and aspects of up-skilling, re-employment and other broader well-being of the veterans including financial and personal well-being.

3. To create and run a platform that will integrate corporates, skilling/ education technology companies and any other enterprises that can assist in veteran reintegration and employment.

4. To develop and maintain digital place to advertise and publish any material with the objective of assisting the veterans. As the largest network of veterans, Company will explore and engage in partnerships with organizations offering products and services towards training, education, consulting, counselling of the veterans.
name: NXT COMMAND PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We have developed smart AC solution that offers the ultimate experience in AC automation. HEXA web solution enables you to control by occupancy, motion, human touch and Admin Controls It communicates wirelessly with AC’s & signals Its On & Off in accordance with human motion & its presence. It works with multiple brands of Air conditioners. The solution is retro fit, easy to install, use and is economic viable for commercial offices & institutes.
name: IoT

idea:
To carry on the business of providing web designing and development services, web application solutions, software development services, e-commerce, internet related consultancy services, internet marketing, online information services, online application integration, information technology and information technology enabled services, maintenance services and other internet related systems, services, products, information, technology and solutions.

 

To provide software development services, information technology enabled services, web enabled services and other services including but not limited back office transaction/ data processing, information management, receivables/ payables management and other related services for all kinds of customers and specially for customers engaged in e-commerce activities.
